properties.name: component
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: dataSource
properties.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
properties.description: Provides data for the suggestion list.

properties.name: displayExpr
properties.description: Specifies the data field whose values should be displayed in the suggestion list.

properties.name: itemComponent
properties.description: An alias for the [itemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: itemRender
properties.description: An alias for the [itemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: itemTemplate
properties.description: Specifies a custom template for suggestion list items.

properties.name: marker
properties.description: Specifies the prefix that a user enters to activate mentions. You can use different prefixes with different [dataSources].

properties.name: minSearchLength
properties.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters that a user should type to trigger the search.

properties.name: render
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: searchExpr
properties.description: Specifies one or several [data fields] to search.

properties.name: searchTimeout
properties.description: Specifies the delay between when a user stops typing and when the search is executed.

properties.name: template
properties.description: Specifies a custom template for mentions.

properties.name: valueExpr
properties.description: Specifies which [data field] provides unique values to the [template]'s `id` parameter.
